attributes.action: Hold a referendum on combining the UK's four national football teams into one.
attributes.additional_details: Give the people of the UK a chance to bring their football teams under one flag so that we can put the best British players into one team and win international tournaments again.
attributes.background:
We are stronger together than we are divided. 

Hold a UK referendum on whether to pass a law that would oblige the football teams of England, Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland to combine into one British team for international tournaments.
